ext_descriptions.ext_description:
The property_assignment_select is an extensible list of alternate data types. It provides a mechanism to refer to one of the listed types.
Extensions of this Select type, primarily designed to specify the list of entity data types to which properties can be assigned, are constrained by the existence of resource entities to represent in the MIM schema such an assignment and by the semantics of these entity data types. For example:
assignment of properties to activity related data types is represented with the resource entity action_property and is dealt with by module Process_property_assignment.
data types that are subtypes of entity data types Representation and Representation_item shall not be added in any extension of this Select type, as they provide elements of representation of a property and are not expected to have properties.

An Assigned_property specifies a property that is assigned to product data.
The mapping provided for that entity and for its attribute described_element is incomplete. It needs to be completed in any module that uses this module and extends the type property_assignment_select.
the string that specifies the kind of property.
a text that provides further information about the property. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
the element to which the property is assigned.
a text that provides further an identifier for the Assigned_property. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

An Applied_independent_property is an association of an Assigned_property with an Independent_property. It characterizes the fact that the Assigned_property is the application of the Independent_property to product data.
the Independent_property from which the type of the Assigned_property is derived.
the name of the Assigned_property, derived from the property_type of the Independent_property.
A Property_representation specifies an association between an Assigned_property and one of its representations.
the Representation associated with the property.

the string that specifies the role of the representation with respect to the property. The value of this attribute need not be specified. 'detailed representation', 'simplified representation' are examples of role.
a text that provides further information about the Property_representation. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
